Pre-Game Insights: Coach Walid Regragui spoke of the effectiveness and the limits of the offensive strategy used against Gabon. He pledged to give opportunities to young players during today's match.
Regragui noted his cautious approach to choosing the right moment to give young players a chance.
The Atlas Lions are well aware that no match is a walkover in Africa, a lesson learned from experiences in both previous AFCON tournaments and qualifiers.
